headline: PTC & Lamborghini Unveil Intelligent Product Lifecycle Vision
summary: PTC shows how Lamborghini is modernizing product development with AI-driven lifecycle tools, unifying design, engineering and operations for faster innovation.

raw.headline: PTC & Lamborghini Unveil Intelligent Product Lifecycle Vision
raw.summary: PTC shows how Lamborghini is modernizing product development with AI-driven lifecycle tools, unifying design, engineering and operations for faster innovation.

headline: Is PTC Attractive After Recent Industrial Software Expansion And DCF Implied Upside?
summary: Wondering if PTC at around $175 is quietly setting up a value opportunity, or if the easy gains are already gone? This breakdown will help you decide whether it still deserves a spot on your watchlist. The stock has drifted slightly lower in the short term, with a 1.2% drop over the last 7 days and a modest 1.6% gain over 30 days. Longer term it is still up 44.0% over 3 years and 46.7% over 5 years, even as it sits 3.9% down year to date and 6.0% lower over the past year. Recent headlines...
